Question: Dongguan Brilliant Packaging Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Brilliant Packaging Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Supplier of EVA material packaging design and production
- Committed to providing environmentally friendly, moisture-proof, pressure-proof, shock-proof EVA packaging case for major brand products
- Offers packaging design solutions for various industries
- 4 production workshops for material compounding, compression molding, finished sewing products, and quality inspection packaging
- Own R&D and design department for exclusive EVA packaging case designs
- Products sold well overseas in Europe, America, and Japan
- 500+ new styles created monthly based on OEM and ODM service
- Strict QC procedures from material to finished products
- Low MOQ with full custom design
- Professional, patient, focused, and responsive team
- BSCI Certified supporting great brand’s factory audit
Summary_cn:
东莞市卓越包装有限公司。

CES 2024产品亮点：
- 供应EVA材料包装设计和生产
- 致力于为各大品牌产品提供环保、防潮、抗压、抗震的EVA包装盒
- 为各行业提供包装设计解决方案
- 拥有材料配料、压缩成型、成品缝制、质量检验包装等4个生产车间
- 拥有专属EVA包装盒设计的研发和设计部门
- 产品在欧洲、美国和日本等海外市场销售良好
- 每月基于OEM和ODM服务推出500多款新款式
- 严格的从原材料到成品的质量控制程序
- 低最小订购量，支持全定制设计
- 专业、耐心、专注和反应迅速的团队
- BSCI认证，支持大品牌的工厂审计
